Top 9 Richest Actor in the World

  • Celebrity

Actor and actress are revered as heroes to many across the world and there’s no surprise that with such fame and adoration comes staggering wealth. It’s easy to assume that the beautiful celebrities we see on our big and small screens are rich beyond their wildest dreams. But have you ever taken a moment to consider who the real wealthiest movie star?
We are here to reveal the list.

  1. SYLVESTER STALLONE
    Net Worth: $400 Million

Sylvester Stallone is an American actor and filmmaker, born on July 6, 1946.He is famous for the title character of Rocky series and John Rambo from movie Rambo. As a young aspiring actor in 1970s, Sylvester became so poor that he even had to sell his beloved dog but there is a happy end to this tale as once his journey to superstardom began he bought his dog back for the much higher price. He then seen in a Rambo film along with other high profile roles, Stallone managed to earn 400 million dollars.

  1.  JOHNNY DEPP
    Net Worth: $400 Million

He is one of the biggest male lead over the last 25 years who managed to earn so much money, thanks to performances and savvy business deals related to the Pirates of the Caribbean franchise as well as high profile collaborations. He takes more than 20 million dollars per film, the highest figure of any actor in Hollywood. In 2012, he was even listed in the Guinness World Book of Records as being the highest-paid actor with annual earnings of a whopping 75 dollars. But currently, he is facing some financial problems. He spends 2 million dollars per month for his lifestyle and 30 thousand dollars on wine per month.

  1. AMITABH BACHCHAN
    Net Worth: $425 Million

He is the most iconic name in the Indian Film Industry .he started his career in the 1970s and famously known as the angry man in his more than 40 years career and comprising of 180 plus films most of which were blockbusters. Movie lovers might recognize him from his 2013 Hollywood debut role in The Great Gatsby along with Leonardo DiCaprio.

  1. MEL GIBSON
     Net worth: $426 Million

He was born in New York in 1956 and moved to Australia and embarked on his acting career, he was internationally famous for his role in Lethal Weapon series. He was recognized as an Academy Award Winning director for epic war film Braveheart. He was the most controversial star for his comments but he later got success with war movie Hacksaw Ridge.

 

  1. TYLER PERRY

              Net worth: $450 million

Tyler Perry is an American actor, filmmaker, comedian, and screenwriter who over the decades has specialized in creating high-quality and innovative content for the African- American audience. His iconic character Madea, a tough elderly black woman captured the hearts of people all over the world and his collection of movies has earned him more than two hundred and sixty million dollars. Perry also earns big on the small screen with shows like House of Payne.

  1. GEORGE CLOONEY

               Net Worth: $500 Million

 The most recognizable faces in the entertainment world George Clooney with an estimated wealth of a half a billion dollars. Mr. Clooney has proven himself to not only be a great actor but an intelligent businessman best known internationally for his television career on ER.He’s garnered both Golden Globes and Oscars for his wide range of performances over the year. In 2015, his salaries have been 25 million dollars for Tomorrowland, 20 million dollars for Money monster in 2016 and 20 million dollars for movie Gravity in 2013.

  1. TOM CRUISE

               Net Worth: $550 Million

There is no denying that Tom Cruise is one of the first names on anyone’s list when it comes to huge Hollywood name stars and he certainly has the wealth to support that claim in a long and fruitful career that has seen him become both a bonafide action star and dramatic performer. Cruz has made hit after hit from Top Gun to Mission Impossible to Jack Reacher. Of course, when your level of celebrity reaches as Tom Cruiser’s the salaries you can command get bigger and bigger. Some of Cruz’s biggest paydays have been 25 million dollars for 2015’s Mission Impossible: Rogue Nation, 20 million dollars for 2008’s Valkyrie and 25 million dollars for 2003’s The Last Samurai and staggering total check for 75 million dollars each for Mission Impossible 2 & 3.

  1.  SHAHRUKH KHAN

           Net Worth: $600 Million

The romance King of Bollywood Shahrukh Khan with a career list of more than 80 Hindi films and several other successful ventures, Khan has earned approximately six hundred million dollars. What’s so extraordinary about Khan’s fortune is that he didn’t make his Hindi film debut until 1992 meaning that he has made considerably more than half a billion dollars in 25 years as well as being extraordinary wealthy khan is also an incredibly generous philanthropist donating to a number of organizations including UNESCO.

  1. JERRY SEINFELD

           Net Worth: $850 Million

The richest living actor in the world is without a doubt is a comedian Jerry Seinfeld with a staggering net worth of eight hundred and fifty million dollars. Jerry is one of the most iconic and instantly recognizable faces in the entertainment industry and his sitcom Seinfeld has made him one of the wealthiest celebrities in the world. According to The Forbes Seinfeld was earning 267 million dollars per year at the peak of his show He is the highest paid comedian and had the deal of multi-million dollar at his prime time. Jerry likes to spend his fortune on a luxury car.

Author: Sailesh
